explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of deep neural networks and reinforcement learning in automatic trading systems, which are core components of machine learning.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of reinforcement learning (RL) in developing trading agents and adversarial attacks against RL-based systems.
explanations.neural network: The paper refers to deep neural networks (DNNs) as part of the algorithmic trading models being studied.
explanations.deep learning: The incorporation of DNNs with reinforcement learning in trading systems indicates the use of deep learning techniques.
